summary:
This mod makes snowy roads use the landscape snow texture,
letting the area look more natural.
descriptionHtml:
[b] [size=15]What does this mod do?[/size] [/b]

[size=5]This mod [b]makes snowy roads use the landscape snow texture,[/b]
letting the area look more natural.[/size]

[u][size=4]Works very well with:[/u]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52682/?]More Dirt on the Road[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52886/?]More Ash on the Road[/url][/size]



[u][size=8]Introduction:[/size][/u]
[size=4]
I don´t really like the not-snow-covered-rocks on the roads in the snowy regions in Skyrim.
So I made them use the snowy landscape texture Instead.

This mod does not contain a texture replacer, it makes use of the already installed snow texture.
That means your cool snow landscape texture from another mod will now also show up on roads!
(I left the _n.dds normal map alone to keep the 3D rocks look.)[/size]


[u][size=8]Video Demonstration:[/size][/u]
[size=4]Here is a great Video by [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/nozi87/videos?view=0&flow=list&live_view=500&sort=dd]NOZI87[/url],
demonstrating the concept of the "More Nature on the Road" series.[/size]
[youtube]fvLUnDgj-oc[/youtube]
Thank you, NOZI87, for this nice video :)


[u][size=8]Requirements:[/size][/u]
[size=4]Nothing special required to run this mod.[/size]


[u][size=8]Compatibility:[/size][/u]
Thanks to Ablaze666 for testing!
[size=4]- This mod should be loaded after [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40512/?]Project Parallax[/url] or the new texture will not appear. (Same texture set edits.)
- Compatible with everything else. (If not, let me know.)[/size]


[u][size=8]Bugs:[/size][/u]
[size=4]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22745/?]Footprints[/url] do not show on the roads.[/size]
That´s not really a bug because footprints never did work on roads.
But it does make sense to enable them now that there is more snow on the road...
author: Dani - Gruberix
